main event: A woman in Costa Mesa, California reported seeing a strange pulsating light in the sky that changed color from red to green to white on the night of February 13, 1965.
interesting points: The light seemed to move very rapidly and then would hover.
The light was about the size of a nickel held at arm's length and appeared to be at an altitude of 13,000 to 15,000 feet.
The light source seemed to emit a light beam that would turn and shine directly in the witnesses' faces, causing them to become alarmed and leave the area.
The witness was a Navy enlisted man's wife who was advised to contact authorities about the incident.
The incident was reported to the Space Systems Division of the Air Force, which forwarded the information to the Air Force Materiel Command and the Foreign Technology Division.
sighted object: a pulsating light that changed color from red to green to white
